at the tone please record your name, press any key or stop talking to end the recording.

record your message at the tone, press any key or stop talking to end the recording

to forward this message to another mailbox

to add an introduction to this message...

That mailbox is full. Please try your call again later.
Welcome to your new voicemail. To listen to a tutorial and setup your voice mail box, press 1. To skip, press 2.
I need to record your first and last name. This recording is used throughout the system, including in the company directory.
Your personal identification number, or 'pin', is used to prevent others from accessing your voicemail messages. Would you like to change it now?
The person you are trying to reach is not available and does not have voicemail.
The PIN you entered is below the minimum length.
Please enter your new password, then press the pound key.
The password you entered is not valid on this system.
A password such as '1111' or '1234' is not secure.
Please choose a password that does not contain all repeating or all consecutive digits.
Remember that your voicemail password is also your Web interface password.
Nobody is currently leaving a message in this voicemail box.
The extension you have dialed does not answer and there is no voicemail box set up for this extension.

Please re-enter your pin number to confirm.

Thank you, this phone will now reboot.
Thank you. Your recording has been saved.
Press 1 to save your recording. Press 2 to review your recording. Press 3 to re-record.
The system is unable to save your sound file at this time. Please try again later.
Please state your name and the reason for your call.
To accept, press 1. To reject, press 2. To send to voicemail, press 3.
To accept, press 1. To reject, press 2.
Please stay on the line. Your call will be answered momentarily.
Please enjoy the music while your call is being transferred.
This menu has no items. Please contact the administrator.
Enter the first few letters of the person's last name.
Enter the first few letters of the person's first name.
Enter the first few letters of the person's first or last name.
When you are finished, press the pound or hash key.
Do not disturb is now activated.
Do not disturb has been cancelled.
Press one for yes. Press two for no.
Please enter the queue number, followed by the pound or hash sign.
...followed by the pound or hash key.
You have requested a wakeup call for...
You have not requested a wakeup call.
Your wakeup call has been cancelled.
We are experiencing longer than usual hold times.
Your call will be answered in the order it was received.
Please hold while your party is being contacted.
Please enjoy the music while your party is being reached.
Thank you for calling. If you know your party's extension, please enter it now, or dial nine for a directory.
If this is correct, press 1. If not, press 2.
Did you mean to press that key?
Seriously. Did you REALLY mean to press that key?
That's it! One more mistake and I WILL hang up on your ass.
Congratulations, you pressed star. This does not mean you ARE a star. It simply means that you can press buttons and probably have fingers.
All of our engineers are busy assisting other sales guys with demonstrating how cool the CudaTel is.
All your call are belong to us.
I just love the way you press those touch tones!
Your call is very important to us, but your sanity is not, so we will be happy to keep you on hold, forever torturing you with our annoying hold music.
This phone is unassigned and may not be used to make external calls.
This phone is not configured properly.
Congratulations! This phone is configured properly and may now be assigned to a user.
Please contact the system administrator for assistance.
There are no calls waiting in this queue.
You are caller number one. Of course, *every* caller is number one in our book so you may be waiting a while.
Please enter the source telephone number, then press pound.
Please enter the destination telephone number, then press pound.
You are no longer in queue.
This phone is not allowed to make external calls.
Hang up the call without pressing a key to discard the recording.
Your call cannot be completed as dialed.
Please check the number and try again.
You do not have permission to perform this action.
You're doing it wrong, but I'll try to connect you anyway. (Douchebag!)
Thank you for calling Douche Telecom, where we make sure that your communications never have that 'not so fresh' feeling!
That number is on the Do Not Call list.
The call attempt has been aborted.

CONCENTRATE! Focus on the bunny! FOCUS ON THE BUNNY!
If you dont like it, you can file a JIRA!
Allow me to introduce, the founder of FreeSOURCE, Anthony Ministrone.
Man, that is cold foolish...COLD Foolish

Please enter your pin number followed by the pound or hash key.
To hotseat this phone to your extension, press 1. To remove hotseat on this phone, press 2.

Your call will be terminated in...
ClueCon is the premier open source telephony developer conference.
It is held in downtown Chicago each summer.
ClueCon brings together a wide range of VoIP engineers, software developers, and business persons.
By attending ClueCon, you are showing support not only for FreeSWITCH but also the entire spectrum of open source telephony software.
FreeSWITCH is open source software that is sponsored by OSTAG - the Open Source Telephony Advancement Group.
OSTAG is advancing the next generation of telephony through open-source software. Learn more at www.ostag.org.
To learn more about FreeSWITCH Solutions, press...
FreeSWITCH is a state of the art telecommunications platform.
It is stable, highly scalable, and extensible.
Best of all, it is free for anyone to download and use.
Visit www dot freeswitch dot org to learn more about our project and worldwide community.
FreeSWITCH Solutions offers the best FreeSWITCH consulting money can buy.
We have a network of FreeSWITCH experts that includes the core FreeSWITCH development team.
Contact us at W-W-W dot freeswitchsolutions dot com to see how we can help you take your FreeSWITCH experience to the next level.
Would you like to speak live with other members of the FreeSWITCH community?
Join us each Wednesday at 1PM eastern time on the public FreeSWITCH conference.
More information is available online at wiki dot FreeSWITCH dot org.
Welcome to the FreeSWITCH community conference call!
This phone is not authorized to make outside calls.
This call may be monitored or recorded for quality and training purposes.
Welcome to the ZRTP security enrollment agent.
You must check the authentication string with your partner. If it doesn't match, it indicates the presence of a wire tapper.
Only phones that are authenticated can be configured to trust this system to relay ZRTP secured calls. Your phone is not authenticated with this system, so this call will have no effect.
Your phone indicates that it already trusts this system to relay ZRTP secured calls, so you do not need to do anything more.
Only phones equipped with the ZRTP protocol can use this extension. Your phone is not a ZRTP-enable phone, so this call will have no effect.

This system is equipped to handle ZRTP encrypted phone calls. You must decide if you want to allow this system to be in a position to intercept and possibly monitor your secure phone calls. You may hang up after you've done this.
Verbally compare this authentication code with your partner.
